api_list.name: Get pal info
api_list.description: Retrieves pal info. E.g., type, rarity, price, etc..
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://palworld-api1.p.rapidapi.com/api/pals_info/Lamball"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "palworld-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://palworld-api1.p.rapidapi.com/api/pals_info/{pal}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "palworld-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
